original_title: Ni se lo llevó el viento, ni puñetera falta que hacía
overview: Amadeo is a normal-looking young man. He earns his living practicing the profession of photographer in a store-studio dedicated to the making of cards, wedding reports, baptisms, etc. But it doesn't match at all with his dreams of becoming a big star in photography. On the other hand, and given his clumsiness and shyness, success is not precisely the one that accompanies him in his relationships with women.
title: Ni se lo llevó el viento, ni puñetera falta que hacía
